1 Ashita
 1.1 Who are we


Ashita is a leading supplier of water filtration system for domestic, business and industries use. We pride ourselves in using the best filtration media from Japan, U.S.A, Korea and Taiwan filtration technology in all of our product. We mostly uses micro filter (Ultra filtration) pre-filter or Point-of-Entry (POE) Filters in ensuring a clearance and safer for human consumption. We continuously strive for products innovation to cater for our ever changing environment needs and our customers' expectation and demand for safer and better quality to use and drink.


1.2 Vision and goal


Our vision and goal is to make Ashita filtration system a household name, to provide a cleaner, clearer and safer water for consumption. Customers' satisfaction remains as our top priority in everything we do at Ashita.
